examples.example: 在人生的道路上，我们要保持乐观积极的心态，勇敢前行。

translate.english: On the road of life, we should keep an optimistic and positive attitude and move forward bravely.

examples.example: 在这条宽阔的道路上，我们充满信心地追逐着自己的梦想。

translate.english: On this broad road, we are chasing our dreams with full confidence.

examples.example: 沿着这条蜿蜒的道路，我们愉快地欣赏着沿途的美景。

translate.english: Along this winding road, we happily enjoy the beautiful scenery along the way.
